docs.lead_paragraph: WITH "Epithalamium," by Jacques Chardonne, we have the English version of a novel ("l'Epithalame") which not only gained the Northcliffe Prize two years ago, but also won a consensus of praise from native critics who are seldom so unanimous.

headline.main: " Epithalamium" From the French -- Other New Novels; " EPITHALAMIUM" (l'Epithalame). Translated from the French of Jacques Chardonne. 238 pp. New York: George H. Doran Company. $2.50.

docs.snippet: WITH "Epithalamium," by Jacques Chardonne, we have the English version of a novel ("l'Epithalame") which not only gained the Northcliffe Prize two years ago, but also won a consensus of praise from native critics who are seldom so unanimous.
